author: Vexed (Vexed#3211)
name: MadTranslate
install_msg: Note: this uses an undocumented API for Google Translate. As such, this cog may break at short notice.
description: Translate something from English into a gazillion different languages then back to English. Uses an undocumented Google Translate API.
short: Translate something from English into a gazillion different languages then back to English. Uses an undocumented Google Translate API.
